price: እርሱም ያ ነፋሶችን አብሳሪዎች ሲኾኑ ከዝናሙ በስተፊት የላከ ነው፡፡ ከሰማይም አጥሪ ውሃን አወረድን፡፡
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ أَرۡسَلَ ٱلرِّيَٰحَ بُشۡرَۢا بَيۡنَ يَدَيۡ رَحۡمَتِهِۦۚ وَأَنزَلۡنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءٗ طَهُورٗا

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wahuwa alladhī arsala al-riyāḥa bush'ran bayna yaday raḥmatihi wa-anzalnā mina al-samāi māan ṭahūran
